identity.name: The Swiss Lab
identity.metaphor: A digital darkroom for the modern marketer. Precision, clarity, and raw utility.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss International Style with Digital Brutalism.
Content is King: The user's image is the hero. The UI is the frame.
Grid is God: Everything aligns. No floating elements without purpose.
Contrast is Key: Black on White. No grey zones.

heading.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Big numbers

mono.usage: Dimensions, File sizes, Technical specs, Code snippets

usage_rules: Secondary Action (Upload): Use White with Black Border.
Borders: All containers must have a 1px border in #E4E4E7.

buttons.secondary: bg-background border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-12 px-8

cards.style: bg-card border border-border p-6 rounded-sm shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: bg-background border-input h-12 rounded-sm focus:ring-1 focus:ring-ring font-mono text-sm

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (opacity 0.02).
decorations: Technical crosshairs (+) in corners of the canvas.
Ruler markings along the edges of the preview area.
Barcode or QR code motifs for 'generated' assets.

placeholder_calibration.description: Abstract geometric shapes in a white frame - Use as default preview when no image is uploaded.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Sharp joins if possible.

sidebar.style: border-r border-border bg-card flex flex-col items-center py-8

config_panel.content: Output Configuration Accordion, Global Settings (Brand, Accessibility), Generate Button

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Run the npm install command for fonts immediately.
2. IMPORT FONTS: Add imports in src/index.js or App.js.
3. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors and font families defined above.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the 3-column layout (Sidebar, Canvas, Config Panel) using Flexbox or Grid.
5. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components but override the styles to match the 'Swiss Lab' aesthetic (rounded-sm, sharp borders).
6. PREVIEW: The preview area should look like a 'Worktable'. Use the placeholder image if state is empty.
7. ACCORDION: The Output Configuration is the core interaction. Make it feel robust.
8. NO GRADIENTS: Strictly enforce the flat color rule.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, accordion triggers).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for floating overlays (like toasts or modals).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
